title: The Invite Friends button exists on the My Friends screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the My Friends screen
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the top right corner
custom_expected: Then we will see a button exists to invite friends

title: User presses Invite Friends Icon from My Friends screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head To Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "My Friends" screen
AND we tap on the "Invite Friends" to download the App button
custom_expected:
THEN the Invite Friends screen will appear
AND there will be a tab for Facebook
AND there will be a tab for Contacts
AND there will be a tab for Search

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, a button exists to invite friends to download the App
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we tap on a random "Challenge Type"
custom_expected: THEN we will see that on the "Select Opponent" screen that a button exists to invite friends to download the Application

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, if the user taps the button to invite friends to download the App that the Invite Friends page opens
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head To Head
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "Select Opponent" screen
AND we tap on the "Invite Friends" to download the App button
custom_expected:
THEN the Invite Friends screen will appear
AND there will be a tab for Facebook
AND there will be a tab for Contacts
AND there will be a tab for Search

title: Facebook Tab of the Invite Friends Screen
custom_preconds:
Given the user has logged in
And the user has selected 'My Profile'
And the user has selected 'My Friends' 
And the user is not connected to Facebook
custom_expected:
Then the user will be defaulted to the Facebook tab
And the user will not see any suggestions or anything under the all
And the user will see 'connect' buttons

title: Import Facebook contacts
custom_preconds:
Given the user has logged in
And the user has selected 'My Profile'
And the user has selected 'My Friends' 
And the user is not connected to Facebook
custom_expected:
Then the user will be redirected to log in to Facebook and accept permission to give MLB.com access
AND Facebook contacts will be imported under Facebook tab

title: Invites friend to play game
custom_preconds:
Given the user has logged in
And the user has selected 'My Profile'
And the user has selected 'My Friends'
And the user has selected 'Invite a Friend'
custom_steps: When the user selects 'invite' next to a Facebook friend
custom_expected:
Then an invite will be sent to friend of user through Facebook to play Head to Head Challenge
AND the friend will successfully receive the invite on Facebook

title: User is on the Contacts Tab of the Invite Friends Screen
custom_preconds:
Given the user has logged in
And the user has selected 'My Profile'
And the user has selected 'My Friends'
custom_steps:
When the user selects 'Invite Friends'
And is default on the Facebook tab
And selects the Email tab
custom_expected:
The user will se Suggestions and All based on contacts in the iDevice Contacts
And Contacts default avatar and e-mail address
And Invite button (if invite not sent) or Invite Sent (If invite sent)

title: Inviting contact to play game
custom_preconds:
Given the user has logged in
And the user has selected 'My Profile'
And the user has selected 'My Friends'
And the user has selected 'Invite a Friend'
And the user has selected 'Contacts' tab
custom_steps: When the user selects 'invite' next to an email on Contact tab
custom_expected:
Then an invite will be sent to friend of user through email to play Head to Head Challenge
AND the friend will successfully receive the invite in the proper email address that is provided through Head to Head Challenge

title: User is on the Search Tab of the Invite Friends Screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Profile Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the "My Friends" screen
AND we tap on the "Invite Friends" to download the App button
AND tap on the Search tab
custom_expected:
THEN the Search tap opens
AND a Search Username search field opens
AND you can search for Usernames of other players

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, if the user has selected to invite a friend, a customized message appears
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random "Challenge Type"
AND we tap on the button that allows us to invite a friend
AND we try both Twitter and Text invitation types
custom_expected: THEN we will see that each type has a customized message with a link to the App Store for the Head to Head Application

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, if the user has selected to invite an already playing friend through e-mail, the user is added to your friends list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random "Challenge Type"
AND we tap on the button that allows us to invite a friend
AND we try the E-Mail type
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the user's e-mail is registered by the service as a current player and the user is added to our Friends list

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, if the user has selected to invite a non-playing friend through e-mail that a canned email message is sent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random "Challenge Type"
AND we tap on the button that allows us to invite a friend
AND we try the E-Mail type
custom_expected: THEN we will see that a canned message is e-mailed with a link to the App Store for the Head to Head Application

title: On the "Select Opponent" screen, if a user has selected to invite a friend via Facebook, they can post to their friend's wall
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we tap on a random "Challenge Type"
AND we tap on the button to invite friends to download the Application
AND we tap on the Facebook option
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Facebook option allows us choose a Facebook friend
AND we can post to the Friends wall with a Head to Head invite

title: Invite to a friend with multiple email addresses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed Head to Head
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are on the Challenge Tab
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on the "New" button in the top right corner
AND we select a random "Challenge Type"
AND we tap on the button that allows us to invite a friend
AND we try the E-Mail type
AND we select a contact who has multiple e-mail addresses in the contact list
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be prompted to select which email address to send the invite to
AND the email will only send to the selected email address
